sources.title: The Sons Of Mistletoe | Full Christmas Movie 2023 | Happy Holidays!
sources.description:
The Sons Of Mistletoe - A foster home for boys is in danger of being closed when its benefactor dies.
2001. Stars: Roma Downey, George Newbern, Scott Terra, Cathy Lee Crosby

metadata.Plot: An heiress who was long estranged from her father comes to town to sell off all of his belongings. Too late she learns that she has sold a boy's orphanage run by a gentle man who grew up there.
metadata.Actors: Roma Downey, George Newbern, Scott Terra
